Patrick Williams averaged 21.5 points on 62% shooting in our final two playoff games.

Sam Smith would like to see him "be a less nicer guy on the court."

📰 | @SamSmithHoops' mailbag:

📍 West Loop, Chicago. 

🎨: sef.01 https://t.co/ncgXHpbU4z
@ChicagoBears @kyler_gordon @MillerLite @UW_Football Welcome to the Windy City, @kyler_gordon!

Zach on the offseason moves giving him confidence in the org: "It was huge, getting a guy like Vooch at the deadline... getting a guy like DeMar, Zo & AC, bringing those guys is huge. This year has been incredible... I thought it'd be a special year & it was a special group." https://t.co/Q3dC3Ecbx3

Zach on free agency: "I understand the relationship I've had with AK and the last five years here, I hope the city understands how much I care about the Bulls. I'm going into everything open-minded but knowing how much I've enjoyed my time here." https://t.co/85OhzBkPBv

Zach LaVine: "I need to go into the offseason and figure out how to get back to 100%. I wasn't playing at 100, need to find a strategy to get my knee back to normal, get back to LA and see my doctor and figure out what's the best plan of action." https://t.co/tY4siNBgw9
LIVE: Zach LaVine 2021-22 End-of-Season Presser https://t.co/PmLMXgyA21

AK: "I was pleasantly surprised last summer how many people wanted to play in Chicago. The history of this franchise, the city of Chicago, I think anybody that steps into the UC feels the passion & energy... a lot of people want to play in Chicago." https://t.co/5BLgojOOV1

AK on the roster: "I hope for continuity, because we're competing against teams that have been together 3-5 years - results come when you keep the same group longer. We'll figure out what additions we need - shooting, defense, size, athleticism - we'll sit down & figure it out." https://t.co/l0LGYQhp3M

AK on Zo: "We missed him greatly this year. We missed his size, him pushing the break, we got a little bit slower second-half of the season. We missed his eight 3-pt attempts @ 42%. We're missing him but we'll pay attention to what's going on there and figure it out this summer." https://t.co/78UpjVfkcf

AK: "I want to thank our fanbase, coming back to (the UC), it was special to watch them. The passion in that building, I hated to disappoint them... even when we went on the road sometimes we felt like we were playing in Chicago. The support we had from fans was amazing." https://t.co/lpq83ZzFCm
LIVE: Artūras Karnišovas End-of-Season Presser  https://t.co/z4k0f6BZOT

Coach: "Our fans this year were incredible... those last 4 home games of the regular season, you want to play much better than we did, certainly Game 3 and 4 here... but there's a lot we can take from this year to build on moving forward." https://t.co/8zKjpYmJ8e

Coach: "When you look at the results, there was some moments where we did a lot of really good things & moments we didn't... the success piece, to me, was with what we had to endure - it could have been unbelievably difficult to deal with, had we not had the kind of guys we had." https://t.co/lZBDpnjOaY
LIVE: Billy Donovan Post Season Presser https://t.co/NG8ceTlIdw

Lonzo Ball: "If everybody can get healthy and come back, I don't see why we couldn't run it back."

📰 | @SamSmithHoops

AC: “I don’t know if we got to see our full potential. To have as many guys as we did miss games...  (missing) big pieces hurt the symmetry, chemistry, the ability to form habits during the season… I think we’re a really good team with a chance to be really special.” https://t.co/J6R0D4p2RB
LIVE: Alex Caruso End-of-Season Presser https://t.co/oCew693ws2

"To be part of this culture, org, city... everything that comes with being with Chicago, it’s definitely an honor... As a kid, there’s always a couple teams you want to create your player to play for, and that’s the Lakers and the Bulls. For me to have this run here, it’s great.” https://t.co/YnMLkWSg4L

DeMar says he plans on inviting teammates, including Patrick Williams, to work out with him in LA to go through a “Summer from Hell” - offseason workouts he does every year.

When asked who he got his offseason workout regiment from: “Kobe. I got it from Kobe early in my career.” https://t.co/hXL9QldNHZ
LIVE: DeMar DeRozan End-of-Season Presser https://t.co/pv20LLYHuS

Ayo on potentially playing in Summer League: “I would like to. That would be a fun experience. Either way I’m fine with that, another way to play and showcase your game. Fun to see between now and another 2 months.” https://t.co/swXbpmcGkg

Ayo: “At the end of the day, everybody wants to be the last team standing. Personally for me I had a pretty good season - more work to be done, more work to accomplish and room for improvement, but with the injuries, covid, our team not being 100%, I battled pretty well.” https://t.co/kLVSGAcq3y
LIVE: Ayo Dosunmu End-of-Season Presser https://t.co/gfkNZu1ncB

Lonzo on watching the playoffs: “Anytime you watch the game you always feel like you can leave an impact... The Bucks - their defense was pack the paint in and load up on guys - so my shooting could have helped.” https://t.co/EdY1id6yrg

Lonzo on what this team could accomplish: “I would love to run it back. I was unhealthy, Caruso went down, Pat was out all the way till the playoffs, Zach was playing hurt the whole year. (When we) get healthy, I don’t see why we can’t run it back.” https://t.co/g5DVUbqOAy
LIVE: Lonzo Ball End-of-Season Presser https://t.co/XjXWa26bEZ

Coby: “I'm excited and looking forward to the offseason to put in time and effort... I feel like I haven’t reached my full potential, there’s a lot I can get better at, and this offseason I can work on a lot of different things and I think my game can grow." https://t.co/9fkraCiBAd
LIVE: Coby White End-of-Season Presser https://t.co/AjZDgnGd1S

Vooch: “I think all the great teams are built over time, nothing happens overnight... You need to give a team continuity... We talked about that in exit meetings. The core guys we have here are really good players, we work well together, it’s about taking the next step forward." https://t.co/ZNDFwA2U64
LIVE: Nikola Vučević End-of-Season Presser https://t.co/MPJwbyENZ5

Pat on what he's learned from DeMar: "He's really resilient mentally, he doesn't let a lot affect him whether he's missing or making shots. You saw it in Games 1 & 2, missing shots and then going for 40. Nothing phases him... that's something I can pick up from him." https://t.co/OTn7ruXsZ7

Pat: “I want to be in this league for a long time...  learned how to deal with (injuries) physically, mentally, know what it means to get back in shape... I learned how to watch film this season from being out... it’s another year in the NBA and you can’t take that for granted." https://t.co/V1WZRXvxqX
LIVE: Patrick Williams End-of-Season Presser https://t.co/L7WcaVT1aM
Good series, till we meet again @Bucks 🤝 https://t.co/4bz7ankDxA

DeMar on coming to Chicago: "It's been a great year... just being around the front office, teammates, the city, everything has been more than I could've imagined... I'm already looking forward to next year, getting out there and doing it again." https://t.co/7htpV4XfMZ
LIVE: DeMar DeRozan speaks postgame https://t.co/E5R9xNgtRU
